name: DIY Factory
description:
Are you a fan of Huggy Waggy toys and DIY games? Then this game is for you!

- Craft your own toy with different fabrics and accessories. You can choose from various shapes, colors, and patterns to make your toy unique and adorable.

- Play or sell your toy at auction to earn coins. You can interact with your toy and see how it reacts to your touch. You can also sell your toy to other players and bid on their toys.

- Enjoy the ASMR sounds and the addictive gameplay. You will love the soothing sounds of sewing, painting, and decorating your toy. You will also have fun with the simple and intuitive gameplay that will keep you hooked.

- Unleash your imagination and create unique toys. You can make anything you want, from cute animals to funny characters. You can also mix and match different fabrics and accessories to create new combinations.
